titleStmt.title: Panchimagogum Febrifugum. Quae ducere oportet quo maxim`e natura. Vergit. eo ducere. Hip. Lib. I. Aphor. 21. Inprimis, you must take all at once, that is one sealed paper, in the pap of a rosted [sic] apple, as big as an hasel [sic] nut, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
